ai-tha-ap453:1.4_0: I know led away from old age.
ai-tha-ap453:2.2_0: cut you down at the foot of a tree.
ai-tha-ap453:2.3_0: I’m going to see a corpse,
ai-tha-ap453:2.4_0: this is the fruit of removing.
ai-tha-ap453:3.4_0: this is the fruit of removing.
ai-tha-ap453:4.4_0: this is the fruit of removing.
ai-tha-ap453:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap453:6.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap453:6.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap453:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap453:8.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap453:8.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap453:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Janavasabha.
